publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2608 Alex Neil: North Sea Oil Revenues—That the Parliament demands that the extra £1.5 billion to be raised from North Sea oil revenues identified in the Chancellor of the Exchequer’s budget be allocated for spending in Scotland.

S2M-2608 Alex Neil: North Sea Oil Revenues—That the Parliament demands that the extra £1.5 billion to be raised from North Sea oil revenues identified in the Chancellor of the Exchequer’s budget be allocated for spending in Scotland.
S2M-2608 North Sea Oil Revenues (lodged on 17 March 2005) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2608 North Sea Oil Revenues (lodged on 17 March 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*
